segments.text: A guy in my office got the flu the other day . Today I seem to have come down with it , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very likely . You have a slight fever . Do you have a headache , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I wonder if you could do something to help me recover soon , because I'll be on a business trip in two days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you have to let your flu run its course . You must stop working and stay in bed to get plenty of rest . Usually it will take 4 to 6 days to make a full recovery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm going on a business trip in two days !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you'll have to cancel it or postpone it . If you go out while you are sick , it won't help you recover . You may even pass your disease on to others .
segments.speaker: S2
